testcase.classname: Rest API Call with Cucumber demo
testcase.name: validate Album Size
testcase.system-out: When user sends a GET request to "http://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/albums".passed Then album size should be 100...............................................passed

testcase.classname: Rest API Call with Cucumber demo
testcase.name: verify users api
testcase.system-out: When user calls the user api "http://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users"....passed Then response status code should be 200.....................................passed And on response user "Bret" should belong to company "Romaguera-Crona" and city "Gwenborough".passed

testcase.classname: Rest API Call with Cucumber demo
testcase.name: verify users api for individual users
testcase.system-out: When user calls the user api to match user and company "http://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users".passed Then on response userName "Antonette" should belong to company "Deckow-Crist".passed

testcase.name: verify users api for individual users 2
